workPosts.title: This Site
workPosts.body: Not a blog, I'm not a blogger. Just a side project to enjoy music while I code, and also to show things I've worked.

workPosts.title: ZEIT Toast Clone
workPosts.body: A front-end challenge required by myself, I worked with animation effects powered by the awesome spring library.

workPosts.title: Hashing with PBKDF2
workPosts.body: Serverless application to use the pbkdf2 algorithm.

workPosts.title: FeatFlag
workPosts.body: A small and modern React library to use the feature toggling principle, using the power of contexts. I've used this technical principle for some of my bigger projects.
